trans-unit.source: Provides a method for indicating which combinations of arguments are valid in an activity.
trans-unit.target: 提供的方法，指示哪些参数组合在活动中有效。

trans-unit.source: Arguments can be grouped together to form valid overload groups.
trans-unit.target: 自变量可以将组合在一起以形成有效的重载组。

trans-unit.source: An overload group cannot be a subset or an equivalent set of another overload group.
trans-unit.target: 重载组不能为子集或等价集的另一个重载组。

trans-unit.source: The only exception to this rule is a subset that contains only arguments where <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此规则的唯一例外是仅包含参数的子集其中<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>是`false`。</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Overload groups can overlap but it is an error if the intersection of the groups contains all the required arguments of one or both the overload groups.
trans-unit.target: 重载组可以重叠，但如果组的交集包含一个或两个重载组的所有所需的参数，则会出错。

trans-unit.source: An overload group is considered bound if all the <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments in the group are bound.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 all，重载组将被视为绑定<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>绑定组中的参数。</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a group has zero <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments and at least one argument bound, then the group is considered bound.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个组具有零<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>自变量且至少一个参数绑定，则该组将被视为绑定。</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is an error if none of the groups are bound unless one overload group has no <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments in it.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有绑定一个重载组不具有任何<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>自变量中它。</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>除非的任何组，则会出错

trans-unit.source: Binding <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A> arguments from more than one overload group is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 绑定<xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>不允许多个重载组中的自变量。</xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is an error to have more than one overload group bound, that is, all required arguments in one overload group are bound and any argument in another overload group is also bound.
trans-unit.target: 很的错误，绑定的多个重载组，绑定一个重载组中的所有必需的参数，并同时绑定另一个重载组中的所有参数。

trans-unit.source: Any violation of the preceding rules results in a <xref:System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException> being thrown when the containing activity is prepared for execution.
trans-unit.target: 在前面的任何违反规则导致在<xref:System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException>包含的活动准备执行时引发。</xref:System.Activities.InvalidWorkflowException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.RuntimeArgument.IsRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true` if the <xref:System.Activities.RequiredArgumentAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> is applied to an argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.OverloadGroupAttribute"></xref> class.
The name of the group of arguments.
The name of the group of related arguments.
Gets a unique identifier for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取此特性的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for this attribute.
